specials.name: Vulnerable to Shatter
specials.description: Llud is affected by the shatter spell as though he were an unattended object.

specials.name: Spell Refraction
specials.description:
Trigger Llud is targeted by a spell; 
Effect Llud positions its magical, reflective shield to turn the spell back on the caster. It tries to counteract the spell by attempting an Acrobatics check for its counteract check. If it successfully counteracts the spell, the effect is turned back on the caster. On a critical success the spell targets one additional opponent  within 15 ft. of the caster.

specials.name: Dazzling Brilliance
specials.description:
The glass golem creates waves of scintillating luminosity that cast bright light in a 60-foot emanation (and dim light for the next 60 feet). The light lasts until the start of the Llud's next turn, after which he can't use Dazzling Brilliance for 1d4 rounds. A creature within the bright light or that enters the bright light must attempt a DC 24 Will save.
Success The creature is unaffected.
Failure The creature is dazzled for 1 round.
Critical Failure The creature is blinded for 1 round and then dazzled for an additional 4 rounds.

specials.name: Luminance Burst
specials.description:
Requirements: Your last action was a strike that hit an opponent. 
Llud casts a spell with the visual trait targeting or centered on the creature that was hit with the strike. Any spells cast that require sustaining last for two rounds automatically and cannot be sustained normally.

immunity.value: bleed, death effects, diseased, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious;
